name: Welcome to Locative Audio
text: This is text about the first stop on the tour. It could be used to introduce the place, or the geographic context. This would also be a good opportunity to acknolwedge the authors of the tour.

name: First Tour Stop
text: This is text about the second stop of the tour. It could be about literally anythingâ€”old buildings, hidden infrastructure or knowledge, local curiousities, songs, folk stories, et cetera.

name: Hidden Stop
text: This is a hidden tour stop. In other words, a point users won't be able to see on the map. It could be something like ambient sound, or narration.
